title: Sleek Germany Escape within Dusseldorf with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Escape to Germany's vibrant and artistic city of Dusseldorf with a stylish stay at voco Dusseldorf Seestern, an IHG Hotel. Celebrated for its thriving art scene and opulent fashion houses, Dussseldorf is an easy choice for a European escape. Spend your days wandering through the shops on Koenigsallee before soaking in the culture at the many musuems dotted across the city. Then, return to this sleek hotel and take advantage of delicious bites and refreshing cocktails at Restaurant 38.
location_description: voco Dusseldorf Seestern, an IHG hotel

title: Dusseldorf Artistic Escape near the City Centre
description: Electric nightlife, striking architectural marvels and high-end art and fashion - that's Dusseldorf in a nutshell, and you can experience it all from Hotel Indigo Duesseldorf - Victoriaplatz, an IHG Hotel. This property is dripping with character: each floor is coated in vibrant artwork and murals that celebrate different decades of fashion. Soak in the summertime sun in the lush garden terrace or venture beyond the hotel to the tranquil Rhine River and surrounding local parks.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Duesseldorf - Victoriaplatz, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Dusseldorf - City North
title: Sleek Dusseldorf City Escape near Airport with Complimentary Breakfast & Lobby Bar
description: Fly free of hassle with a stay at Holiday Inn Express Dusseldorf - City North, an IHG Hotel, situated mere minutes from Dusseldorf International Airport (DUS). Thanks to the hotel’s convenient location just off the motorway and next to the train station, you'll have direct access to the vibrant nightlife, incredible museums, and breathtaking shopping of the city. Before days spent exploring, fuel up with a continental breakfast and relax at day's end with a drink in the plush lobby bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Dusseldorf - City North, an IHG Hotel
